uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

associated_device_profile.description: Associated device_profile Name. default associated_device_profile for DPT_ARUBA_AP is default-ap-profile. default associated_device_profile for DPT_ARUBA_SWITCH is default-aos-profile. default associated_device_profile for DPT_SCS_WAN_CPE is default-scs-profile.
